channel.title: Posts on OutOfBounds | Praneet Shekhar
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on OutOfBounds | Praneet Shekhar

item.title: Building This Site
item.description:
This is a supposed to be simple site, a simple presence for me on the web.
I needed a tool that makes things simple.
While going through the portfolio of few of my seniors, I came across Hugo.

Having mostly used Python & Flask for such purposes before, I needed something as simple but didn’t want to pull out a Swiss knife for buttering bread. Hugo seemed to fit the bill perfectly.

item.title: TCS IT Wiz 2016
item.description:
The Kolkata edition of TCS IT Wiz 2016 was held on the 31st of August.
It is a highly anticipated quiz and a marquee event in the quizzing calendar, being the biggest inter-school IT quiz.
Our school has a rich history in this quiz, with our seniors winning several editions.
So the pressure was immense, especially coming up against the reigning National Champions, Adnan Azmat & Shadan Kalam, two incredibly knowledgeable and exceptional quizzers.

item.title: COFAS 2016
item.description:
The 2016 edition of COFAS, the biennial international computer olympiad organised by City Montessori School, Lucknow was held in the month of November.

There were teams from several countries participating in a pleathora of competitions.
Five of us represented Loyola School Jamshedpur in various events.

I was part of the Computer Quiz and the Game Design Challenge.

Anubhav Kumar Singh and I won the quiz in a dominating fashion.

We stood 2nd in the Game Design Challenge where we created a gamified science learning platform.
